sys_script_include.name: dateUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8bae05971b66a49067a4a8e82d4bcb4d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_stave_am.dateUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Get date in the future</description><name>dateUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var dateUtils = Class.create();
dateUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	initialize: function() {
    },
	getDate: function(days){
		var cDate = parseInt(days);
		var dat = new GlideDateTime();
		dat.addDaysLocalTime(cDate);
		return dat;
	},
    type: 'dateUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jason.garcia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-02 18:07:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>8bae05971b66a49067a4a8e82d4bcb4d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dateUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Stave Asset Manager" source="x_stave_am">53f715ecdbf568d0f24c5e25ca9619b7</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Stave Asset Manager">53f715ecdbf568d0f24c5e25ca9619b7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8bae05971b66a49067a4a8e82d4bcb4d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jason.garcia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-02 18:21:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
